sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Create a Linode VM. Image is optional, if chosen it will boot immediately.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Given a region and a VM type and an optional image, create a VM instance. Action will return the label, the ID, IP address and root password.
